name: Ritual Beast Ambush
effectText: Target 1 of your "Ritual Beast Tamer" monsters and 1 of your "Spiritual Beast" monsters that are banished and/or in your GY; Special Summon them in Defense Position. For the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon, except "Ritual Beast" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Ritual Beast Ambush" per turn.
